articles.description: "She is very active, and was using her sharp claws to dig like an adult aardvark, just hours after her birth," a wildlife specialist said.
articles.content:
A baby aardvark was born at the San Diego Zoo, a first in nearly four decades.

articles.title: Apple workers vote for first unionized store in Maryland
articles.description: In a 65-33 vote, Apple workers at a retail location in Towson, Maryland, voted to create the first unionized store for the tech company.
articles.content:
Employees of an Apple store in Towson, Maryland, a suburb of Baltimore, on Saturday voted to become the first unionized store in Apple's company history.
